body_html: Unfortunately using the name to detect conditionals is pretty fragile, since lots of non-conditionals could match "./cond." too. As a workaround, it might be better to supply a list of node names or patterns not to remove as an argument to the function.
body_text: Unfortunately using the name to detect conditionals is pretty fragile, since lots of non-conditionals could match "./cond." too. As a workaround, it might be better to supply a list of node names or patterns not to remove as an argument to the function.
body: Unfortunately using the name to detect conditionals is pretty fragile, since lots of non-conditionals could match ".*/cond.*" too. As a workaround, it might be better to supply a list of node names or patterns not to remove as an argument to the function.
